name: Boba delivery survival
description:
Boba Delivery Survival
[Created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam]

Courier Simulator in hazardous weather conditions
Control: WASD for running, space for jump, enter for pick up or drop off an order. (You can also use S to drop off surfaces other than roofs) 
Follow the arrow direction at the bottom left to get to your destination.


This is our first game jam and we're happy with the final game!

(We did however have to cut some corners with things like level design since everything took us longer than we expected…)



Credits:
Barsik - Programming, level design
Mitsvalen - Art, level design
Sounds provided by Erokia/Jordan Powell from Freesound https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/
As well as the free sound libraries from
Sonniss https://sonniss.com/

Software Used:
Game maker studio 2
Paint tool SAI 2
Clip Studio Paint
